msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Refactored attributes FXG from constants to properties
Implemented ActionBarSkin, ActionButtonSkin and NavigationButtonSkin layout properties for 160ppi. No new assets.
Implemented 160ppi skins for HScrollBar and VScrollBar
Added placeholder assets for other 160ppi skins
Added ASDoc comments for unsupported styles

Temporary fix in MobileSkin to use 160ppi. Added a targetPPI property to the top level application with value 160. Specify -theme+= <sdk location>/frameworks/projects/mobiletheme/defaults160.css in additional compiler args.
SDK-28280 ActionBar is not resizing when textIndent on titleDisplay is changed.
SDK-28437 Setting textShadowAlpha for ActionBar has no effect
SDK-28227 Allow black-listed themes in Style metadata
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
* Changed airmobile-config.xml to use standalone Mobile theme instead of Spark overlay

* Added theme="spark, mobile" where spark was already white-listed and support is implemented and/or planned for Mobile/spark.css (see https://zerowing.corp.adobe.com/display/flexmobile/Mobile+Theme+Styles+Spec)
* MobileSkin has symbolColor and chromeColor support. Override beginChromeColorFill and drawChromeColor when defining custom chromeColor visuals.
* CheckBox and RadioButton now have chromeColor and symbolColor support
* Added textShadowColor and textShadowAlpha support to Button and ActionBar
* Added chromeColor support to HScrollBar and VScrollBar
QE notes: All mobile skins have been updaetd.
Doc notes: Update mobile skinning documentation for new APIs
SDK-28043 Investigate usage of "viewWidth", "viewHeight" for the Flex Mobile Skin Assets
SDK-27609 Mobile scroll bar skins should use chromeColor
SDK-27646 cornerradius has no effect on button in mobile application
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fix SDK-27642 Unnecessary Measure for Mobile Programmatic Skins
- introduce new protected APIs in MobileSkin, MobileItemRenderer for resizing and positioning elements.
- update Mobile skin code to use new APIs instead of setting explicitly x, y, width, height
- update FXG assetes to make elements pixel aligned
- update Mobile skin code to assume FXG assest are always pixel aligned
QE notes: Verify skins look as expected; mobile item renderers layout as expected
Reviewer: Glenn, Jason S, Jason SJ, Ryan
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
The spark.skins.mobile package was getting crowded, so I have moved some of the classes into sub packages. I have also implemented the PARB changes for the button skins.
- Refactor ButtonSkin to support borderless and backgroundless button skins
- ActionBarActionButtonSkin extends ActionBarButtonSkin -> ActionButtonSkin extends ButtonSkin
- ActionBarNavigationButtonSkin extends ActionBarButtonSkin -> NavigationButtonSkin extends ButtonSkin
- Moved SelectableButtonSkinBase, ButtonSkinBase and MobileSkin to spark.skins.mobile.supportClasses
- Renamed the fxg skin classes using a consistent naming convention (ComponentName_stateName.fxg) and moved them to spark.skins.mobile.assets
- Added some copyright headers and updated some ASDoc comments
- Updated defaults.css to place the icon on the left for ButtonBase
QE notes: Note the API changes and the iconPlacement switch
Is noteworthy for integration: Yes, please note the API changes above
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Removed the sections functionality from ViewNavigator and refactored that logic into TabbedViewNavigator.  Updated dependent performance tests and components.
Introduced MobileApplicationBase and TabbedMobileApplication do support the tabbed use case for mobile.
Deleted SliderSkin from the framework.  All mobile skins now extend MobileSkin.
